question: Kienbock's disease is osteochondritis of which bone?
exp: Ans. is 'b' i. e., Lunate Osteochondritis. Name. Bone. Kienbocks disease. Lunate. Perthes disease. Femoral head. Panners disease. Capitullum. Preiser's disease. Scaphoid. Johansson Larson's disease. Osteochondritis of lower pole of patella. Freiberg's Disease. Osteochondritis of 5th metatarsal head. Calves's disease. Central bony nucleus of vertebral body. Scheurman's disease. Ring apophysis of vertebra. Kohlers disease. Navicular. Sever's disease. Calcaneal tuberosity. Osgood schattler disease. Tibial tubercle
